trans-unit.source: Specifies initialization options for bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: 指定點陣圖影像的初始設定選項。

trans-unit.source: If PreservePixelFormat is not selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> of the image is chosen by the system depending on what the system determines will yield the best performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果未選取 PreservePixelFormat，<xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat>映像的由系統的選擇取決於系統決定將獲得最佳效能。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option preserves the file format but may result in lesser performance.
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項會保留的檔案格式，但是可能會造成較少的效能。

trans-unit.source: If BitmapCreateOptions is set to IgnoreColorProfile, calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.CopyPixels%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> will not return color-corrected bits.
trans-unit.target: 如果 BitmapCreateOptions 設 IgnoreColorProfile，方法等呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.CopyPixels%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>不會傳回色彩修正的位元。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.CopyPixels%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: When IgnoreImageCache is selected, any existing entries in the image cache are replaced even if they share the same <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 選取 IgnoreImageCache 時，即使它們共用相同<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>取代映像快取中的任何現有項目

trans-unit.source: Causes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> object to delay initialization until it is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>延遲初始設定，直到所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when dealing with collections of images.
trans-unit.target: 處理影像集合時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Causes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to ignore an embedded color profile.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>忽略內嵌的色彩設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Loads images without using an existing image cache.
trans-unit.target: 載入影像時未使用現有的映像快取。

trans-unit.source: This option should only be selected when images in a cache need to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 必須重新整理快取中的映像時才應該選取此選項。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> a file is stored in is the same as it is loaded to.
trans-unit.target: 可確保<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>檔案儲存在是相同載入時。
